title: Group Creation
description: Allow users to create study groups based on subjects, topics, or courses they're interested in. This feature enables users to initiate collaborative study efforts and connect with peers who share similar learning objectives.

title: File Sharing
description: Enable users to upload and share study materials, notes, and resources within study groups. This feature fosters collaboration by providing a platform for users to exchange relevant documents, presentations, and other study resources.

title: Task Management
description: Organize and track study-related tasks within study groups. Users can create, assign, and prioritize tasks, ensuring that group activities and assignments are effectively managed and completed.

title: Calendar and Scheduling
description: Provide a calendar feature for scheduling study sessions, meetings, and events within groups. Users can coordinate their study schedules, set reminders, and plan their study activities more effectively.

title: Privacy and Security
description: Implement measures to protect user data and communications within the platform. This feature includes encryption, user authentication, and data access controls to safeguard sensitive information and maintain user confidentiality.

title: Accessibility
description: Ensure that the platform is accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. This feature focuses on designing the website to be inclusive and usable for everyone, regardless of their abilities or assistive technologies.

title: Group Search and Discovery
description: Facilitate the search and discovery of study groups within the platform. Users can find relevant study groups based on keywords, subjects, or location, enhancing their ability to connect with like-minded peers for collaborative learning.

title: Feedback and Ratings
description: Allow users to provide feedback and ratings for study groups, sessions, and other members. This feature enables users to share their experiences, provide constructive criticism, and help improve the overall quality of collaboration within the platform.

title: File Sharing
description: File sharing allows users to upload and share study materials, notes, and resources within study groups. This feature facilitates collaboration by providing a platform for users to exchange relevant documents, presentations, and other study resources.

title: Accessibility
description: Accessibility ensures that all users, including those with disabilities, can access and use the online group study platform. This feature focuses on designing the website to be inclusive and usable for everyone, regardless of their abilities or assistive technologies.

title: Privacy and Security
description: Privacy and security features ensure the protection of user data and communications within the online group study platform. This feature implements measures such as encryption, user authentication, and data access controls to safeguard sensitive information and maintain user confidentiality.
